key.name: debug
key.description: If true the extension will print verbosely to the log. See 'journalctl /usr/bin/gnome-shell -f -o cat' for output.

key.name: device-visibility
key.description: In what states a device will be made visible to the user. Possible options are 'OFFLINE' and 'UNPAIRED'. Paired, online devices will always be shown.

key.name: service-autostart
key.description: If true, the service will be automatically started and restarted if it stops. If false the extension will wait for the service to be started.

key.name: service-backend
key.description: The backend to use as the service. Possible options are 'MCONNECT' and 'KDECONNECT'.
